languages.text: "Через эту примитивную технологию тебе видно труп своего драгоценного чудовища?" {n}Друкари удовлетворенно улыбается, видя боль на лице Энриха.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Через эту примитивную технологию тебе видно труп своего драгоценного чудовища?" {n}Друкари удовлетворенно улыбается, видя боль на лице Энриха.{/n}

languages.text: "Does this primitive piece of technology give you a good view of your precious monster's corpse?" {n}Marazhai smiles with satisfaction upon seeing the pain in Einrich's face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Через эту примитивную технологию тебе видно труп своего драгоценного чудовища?" {n}Друкари удовлетворенно улыбается, видя боль на лице Энриха.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Does this primitive piece of technology give you a good view of the corpse of your precious monster?" {n}Marazhai smiles with satisfaction upon seeing the pain in Einrich's face.{/n}
"Does this primitive piece of technology give you a good view of the corpse of your precious monster?" {n}Marazhai smiles with satisfaction upon seeing the pain in Einrich's face.{/n}

"Does this primitive piece of technology give you a good view of your precious monster's corpse?" {n}Marazhai smiles with satisfaction upon seeing the pain in Einrich's face.{/n}
"Does this primitive piece of technology give you a good view of your precious monster's corpse?" {n}Marazhai smiles with satisfaction upon seeing the pain in Einrich's face.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Le permite ver bien el cadáver de su precioso monstruo este trozo de tecnología primitiva?». {n}Marazhai sonríe satisfecho al ver el dolor en el rostro de Einrich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Does this primitive piece of technology give you a good view of your precious monster's corpse?" {n}Marazhai smiles with satisfaction upon seeing the pain in Einrich's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Le permite ver bien el cadáver de su precioso monstruo este trozo de tecnología primitiva?». {n}Marazhai sonríe satisfecho al ver el dolor en el rostro de Einrich.{/n}

languages.text: 「この原始的な技術で、お前の大切な怪物の死体がしっかりと調べられるのか？」 {n}アインリッヒの苦痛の表情を見たマラズハイは満足げに微笑んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Does this primitive piece of technology give you a good view of your precious monster's corpse?" {n}Marazhai smiles with satisfaction upon seeing the pain in Einrich's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この原始的な技術で、お前の大切な怪物の死体がしっかりと調べられるのか？」 {n}アインリッヒの苦痛の表情を見たマラズハイは満足げに微笑んだ。{/n}

languages.text: “莫非这台原始的装置，能让你看清你深爱的那只怪物尸体是什么样子的吗？”{n}玛拉斋看到了艾因里奇脸上的痛苦，露出了满意的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Does this primitive piece of technology give you a good view of your precious monster's corpse?" {n}Marazhai smiles with satisfaction upon seeing the pain in Einrich's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “莫非这台原始的装置，能让你看清你深爱的那只怪物尸体是什么样子的吗？”{n}玛拉斋看到了艾因里奇脸上的痛苦，露出了满意的笑容。{/n}

languages.text: "Gewährt Euch diese primitive Technologie einen guten Blick auf den Kadaver Eures teuren Monsters?" {n}Marazhai lächelt zufrieden, als er den Schmerz auf Einrichs Gesicht bemerkt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Does this primitive piece of technology give you a good view of your precious monster's corpse?" {n}Marazhai smiles with satisfaction upon seeing the pain in Einrich's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gewährt Euch diese primitive Technologie einen guten Blick auf den Kadaver Eures teuren Monsters?" {n}Marazhai lächelt zufrieden, als er den Schmerz auf Einrichs Gesicht bemerkt.{/n}

languages.text: « Cette technologie primitive vous offre-t-elle une bonne vue du cadavre de votre monstre adoré ? » {n}L'expression tourmentée d'Einrich arrache un sourire de satisfaction à Marazhai.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Does this primitive piece of technology give you a good view of your precious monster's corpse?" {n}Marazhai smiles with satisfaction upon seeing the pain in Einrich's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Cette technologie primitive vous offre-t-elle une bonne vue du cadavre de votre monstre adoré ? » {n}L'expression tourmentée d'Einrich arrache un sourire de satisfaction à Marazhai.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu ilkel teknoloji parçası, kıymetli canavarının cesedine dair iyi bir bakış açısı sağladı mı?" {n}Marazhai, Einrich'in yüzündeki acıyı görmesinin ardından tatmin olmuş bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Does this primitive piece of technology give you a good view of your precious monster's corpse?" {n}Marazhai smiles with satisfaction upon seeing the pain in Einrich's face.{/n}
